channel.title: Student loan forgiveness application opens: live updates
channel.description: The application for the Biden administration's student loan relief is now officially open. Join NPR as we answer your questions on aid eligibility, Pell grants, payment restart dates and more.

item.title: This blog is closing now, but the reporting will continue
item.description: Thanks again for joining us! This is our last blog post of the day, but NPR's coverage of student loans is far from over. We'll keep answering your…
